channel.title: Authors on Idclang
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Idclang

item.title: Aksharam
item.description: Explore the nuances of South-East Asian scripts through ravishing infographic posts. Aksharam covers various topics such as Telugu language, Brahmic scripts, Classical literature and more.

item.title: Bhazhazabaan
item.description: Bhashazabaan is an expert on various Indo-Aryan languages, particularly with Hindustani and Bangla. Bhashazabaan is publishes articles in Bengali language here at IDCL.

item.title: IDCL Chief Editor
item.description: IDCL Chief Editor supervises the Articles in idclang website. ICE writes documentation for various languages and language scripts.

item.title: Malayalamozhi
item.description: Malayalamozhi handles the Pacha Malayalam Instagram page, aiming to promote the use of Pure Malayalam as a standardisation.
